subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After squandering leads of 15 points and 10 points in the second half, and after watching Stephon Marbury limp away and Eddy Curry foul out, the Knicks held on to defeat the Indiana Pacers.
snippet: After squandering leads of 15 points and 10 points in the second half, and after watching Stephon Marbury limp away and Eddy Curry foul out, the Knicks held on to defeat the Indiana Pacers.
